pullrequest.title: Modify gazebo rendering to compile with Ogre 1.11/1.12

content.raw:
Indeed, thanks for noticing. In the rest of the PR I actually iterated a bit on the check to do for checking for Ogre >= 1.11, and  I eventually settled in the rest of the PR on `#if OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR == 1 && OGRE_VERSION_MINOR >= 11`, mainly because I do not think that Ogre 0.\* even exists, and this code will never run under Ogre 2, so the only check that I really want to do is on the `OGRE_VERSION_MINOR`, but I keep the equality check on the `OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR` for the sake of readability. If that sounds ok fo you, I would like to use `#if OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR == 1 && OGRE_VERSION_MINOR >= 11` in the rest of the PR.

‌
